channel.title: The Crypto-Mises Podcast
channel.description: The official podcast of the Satoshi Nakamoto Institute
channel.itunes:author: Satoshi Nakamoto Institute
channel.itunes:summary: Michael Goldstein and Daniel Krawisz of the Satoshi Namaoto Institute discuss Bitcoin, economics, and cryptography.

item.title: Monetary Stability
item.itunes:author: Satoshi Nakamoto Institute
item.itunes:subtitle: Daniel Krawisz and Michael Goldstein discuss why the desire for monetary stability is based on economic fallacies.
item.itunes:summary: Daniel Krawisz and Michael Goldstein discuss why the desire for monetary stability is based on economic fallacies. Visit the website for show notes and related links. http://nakamotoinstitute.org/podcast/01-08-15-monetary-stability/ If you enjoyed this episode, show your support by donating to SNI: 19F2KHQmf1MGt5foShsrytzwRiTmQRPK9m

item.title: Appcoins and Bitcoin Maximalism
item.itunes:author: Satoshi Nakamoto Institute
item.itunes:subtitle: Daniel Krawisz and Michael Goldstein discuss appcoins and Vitalik Buterin's critique of "Bitcoin maximalism".
item.itunes:summary: Daniel Krawisz and Michael Goldstein discuss appcoins and Vitalik Buterin's critique of "Bitcoin maximalism". Visit the website for show notes and related links. http://nakamotoinstitute.org/podcast/12-22-14-appcoins-and-bitcoin-maximalism/ If you enjoyed this episode, show your support by donating to SNI: 16Bahm2TaPS4xgWzsXH5n47QnKHD1Z5H7R
